body.name: Moerie Ultimate Hair Growth Shampoo – For Longer, Thicker, Fuller Hair - Vegan Friendly Volumizing Hair Products – Paraben & Silicone Free – All Hair Types – Reverse Hair Loss – 8.45 fl oz (250ml)
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery February 20 - 21. Order within 13 hrs 46 mins.
features: Boost Hair Growth Naturally: Tired of finding stray hairs in the sink and shower? Try our gentle formula shampoo; Packed with 77 fulvic minerals, 18 amino acids, and 5 vitamins, it promotes thicker, stronger hair – see for yourself!

Visible Results in 30 Days: We know how traumatic hair loss can be; That's why we developed our Moerie shampoo; You'll see softer, silkier hair in 30 days and lusher, longer locks by 3-6 months – with a big boost for your confidence

No More Complex Hair Routines: Who has time for soaks and gels? Enjoy simple, stress-free haircare with our hair thickening shampoo for fine hair and all other hair types; Just follow the easy steps and get ready for head-turning hair

100 Vital Nutrients Work Together: Every ingredient in your Moerie Hair Growth Shampoo has a special purpose; Biotin plays a vital role in hair growth by boosting keratin production; Caffeine has stimulating properties; B-complex vitamins support healthy hair growth; etc.

No Artificial Anything: Like all Moerie hair care products, our shampoo contains ingredients of natural origin and is vegan-friendly and cruelty-free; Plus, it contains no parabens, sulfates, silicone, or artificial fragrances; Each 8.45fl oz. bottle lasts 30 days – enjoy!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Is it suitable for all hair types? Moérie haircare products are recommended for all hair types. Is Moérie manufacturing cruelty-free? Moérie products are cruelty-free and certified as animal test-free by PETA. When will I notice the results? Based on instrumental tests, regular use of Moérie “Ultimate Hair Growth” products for 1.5 to 3 months visibly increases hair volume and thickness, replenishes empty hair follicles, and improves scalp and hair condition. Do Moérie products contain caffeine? Some Moérie products contain caffeine, including the “Ultimate Hair Growth” Shampoo and Spray, but the “Ultimate Hair Growth” Mask is caffeine-free. Are Moérie products gluten-free? Yes, Moérie products are gluten-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best on the market
reviews.reviewText: I started using Moerie about 5 months ago because of thinning, dry, brittle hair. Today my hair is silky smooth, soft, and visibly thicker, healthier, and super shiny. It feels amazing. The very best way to experience Moerie, though, in my opinion, is to go to their website, and purchase the whole regimen. It is way less expensive than purchasing the shampoo or conditioner alone, and you will need all 4 products in the regimen to experience the amazing results that I've experienced. I color my hair, also, and this shampoo is extremely kind to the color, and has restored my hair to what it looked like 30 + years ago. I LOVE Moerie and their amazing products. Also, the products are CLEAN of all the bad stuff most shampoo products have in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It seems like my hair has grown since I started using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo lathers up nicely. My hair feels very soft after using it. It's a little soon to see if it helps with hair growth. The only thing I don't like is the smell. It smells a little medicinal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money like I did!
reviews.reviewText: I rarely write a bad review. I had bought Moerie shampoo & conditioner the first time from the company website. I initially loved it. My hair was full of volume and I received soo many compliments. Then they changed the formula accordingly to Moerie customer service. The 2nd time I bought it was from Amazon. I regret buying this shampoo and conditioner. My hair started falling out just using it in the shower. My hairdresser said to me “your hair has really thinned out from the top”. I am just devastated. Both Moerie shampoo & conditioner has been thrown in my trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Don’t have much to say as item arrived with box open and shampoo unsealed… returned for refund

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my hair thicker
reviews.reviewText: I have very thin hair and I have been using the shampoo for maybe a week because I just got it. It does make my hair feel thicker. I will be looking into other products from your company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I buy only this kinda shampoo because to me it's the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hair growth serum
reviews.reviewText: This product seems to work. Have only been using a short time. , but it calms scalp irritation and hair seems thicker after use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent! Actually improves my thin hair. And does make it grow a bit thicker and definitely makes it grow faster. Has a beautiful scent to it . And leaves my hair feeling silky smooth.

Già dal primo utilizzo i capelli appaiono più forti e lucidi. É davvero un ottimo prodotto, dopo sole 2 settimane di utilizzo (usato 3 volte) ho notato che la caduta dei capelli si é ridotta del 70%, lo adoro.Unico neo la bottiglia non è molto grande e il costo é un po’ alto, ma il prodotto é davvero valido e completamente naturale e non testato su animali 💚

Leider ist das Produkt eine völlige Enttäuschung und keinen Cent wert. Es trocknet die Haare völlig aus, macht sie stumpf und glanzlos. Ich kann dieses Produkt absolut nicht weiterempfehlen. Oh, meine Haare überhaupt kämmen zu können, musste ich sie mit einem anderen Produkt ein zweites Mal waschen. Jedes Shampoo aus der Drogerie kann mehr, als dieses hochpreisigen Produkt! Schade um das Geld!
il prodotto arriva con "prime" che è una garanzialo comprerò di nuovo
